<br>
This site contains [Marie-Hélène Burle](https://www.sfu.ca/~msb2/)'s latest content. \
Her older training material can be found on the archived sites:

- [Shell, Git, R, Python, etc.](https://prog.westdri.ca/)
- [Julia training material](https://julia.westdri.ca/)
- [Machine learning training material](https://ml.westdri.ca/)

## Main training website

This is the [mint](/) ("mint is not training") website.

To view all our training material, please visit our main [training](https://training.westdri.ca/) website.
